trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> objects.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> .

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection> is accessed through the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter.Extensions%2A> property of the <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> class.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection> é acessada por meio de <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.SchemaImporter.Extensions%2A> propriedade do <xref:System.Xml.Serialization.XmlSchemaImporter> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a extensão do importador especificada à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a extensão do importador especificada à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the added extension.
trans-unit.target: O índice da extensão adicionada.

trans-unit.source: A custom name for the extension.
trans-unit.target: Um nome personalizado para a extensão.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds the specified importer extension to the collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona a extensão do importador especificada à coleção.

trans-unit.source: The *name* parameter allows you to supply a custom name for the extension.
trans-unit.target: O parâmetro *name* permite que você forneça um nome personalizado para a extensão.

trans-unit.source: The index of the newly added item.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item adicionado recentemente.

trans-unit.source: The value of *type* does not inherit from <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" />.
trans-unit.target: O valor de *type* não herda de <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" />.

trans-unit.source: Clears the collection of importer extensions.
trans-unit.target: Limpa a coleção de extensões de importador.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified importer extension exists in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se a extensão de importador especificada existe na coleção.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the extension is found; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a extensão for localizada; caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> to copy the current collection to.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> para o qual copiar a coleção atual.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index at which the collection is added.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual a coleção é adicionada.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the elements of the current <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> to the specified array of <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> objects at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os elementos do <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> atual para a matriz de objetos <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> especificada, no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> to search for.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> a ser pesquisado.

trans-unit.source: Searches for the specified item and returns the zero-based index of the first occurrence within the collection.
trans-unit.target: Pesquisa pelo item especificado e retorna o índice de base zero da primeira ocorrência dentro da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The index of the found item.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item localizado.

trans-unit.source: The zero-base index at which the <c>extension</c> should be inserted.
trans-unit.target: O índice de base zero no qual a <c>extensão</c> deve ser inserida.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> to insert.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> a ser inserido.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> into the collection at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Insere o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> especificado na coleção, no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The index of the item to find.
trans-unit.target: O índice do item a ser localizado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection" /> no índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Removes an object from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove um objeto da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The name of the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O nome do <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: The name is set using the <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection.Add(System.String,System.Type)" /> method.
trans-unit.target: O nome é definido usando o método <see cref="M:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtensionCollection.Add(System.String,System.Type)" />.

trans-unit.source: Removes the <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" />, specified by name, from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" />, especificado por nome, da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> a ser removido.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <see cref="T:System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension" /> especificado da coleção.
